ROW.DATDSC: select a.guid,b.org,b.id,b.name,c.name deptname,a.url,a.destusrid,a.DESTUSERPWD ,NVL(a.useflg,'1') useflg from (select m.org,m.srcusrid,m.guid,m.url,m.destusrid,m.DESTUSERPWD,m.useflg from usrchg m,sso n where m.url=n.LOGINURL and n.id='[%id]' ) a , usr b , v_dept c where a.srcusrid(+)=b.id and a.org(+)=b.org and b.deptid=c.id(+) and b.org=c.org(+) and b.id like '[%usrid]%' and b.name like '[%usrnam]%' and b.org='[%myorgid]' and nvl(b.deptid,' ') like '[%deptid]%' order by b.id
select loginurl from sso where id='[%id]'
